summary:
A large magic mansion designed for adventurers.
Many named chests, crafting room, magic place, teleporter,
mannequins, library, merchant and more...
descriptionHtml:
A large magic mansion designed for adventurers.

LOCATION => north of BleakFallsBarrow, a dungeon near riverwood (you will have a city marker 
when at this dungeon, for more precision take
a look at the map screenshot).

Tired of your little manor in solitude? Tired of your tiny archmage room?
Then move to a more wealthy place with our new mage mansion!

New 1.02:
- Hall of Triumph :
A huge room with mannequins (wood and flesh), dragon altar etc..
Entrance = a portal in mage room
(you may have some mannequins moving during the first load)
- 2 dremora guard
- added chests in crafting room and stock

New 1.01:
- Teleport room
- Teleport spell book (inside teleport room)
- added leather to merchant
- added blacksmithing chest


Featuring :

- cave style entrance
- mannequins
- weapon racks
- chests for every type of items
- crafting room
- bedroom/kitchen/dinning
- library
- magical place (azura star style with ench alch and shrine)
- merchant
- 1 litlle secret

Have fun!
author: Aldaris

files.name: Mage Mansion 1-01

teleporter room
